snippet: The departure of Rebecca Kirszner Katz, whom Mayor Bill de Blasio once called “the fifth member of our immediate family,” is another sign of second-year attrition in the mayor’s staff.
abstract: Rebecca Kirszner Katz steps down as special adviser to New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio; move is latest in string of high-level personnel changes in second year of de Blasio's term.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

lead_paragraph: The departure of Rebecca Kirszner Katz, whom Mayor Bill de Blasio once called “the fifth member of our immediate family,” is another sign of second-year attrition in the mayor’s staff.

headline.main: Adviser and Caretaker of de Blasio Family Image Is Leaving City Hall
headline.print_headline: Adviser and Caretaker of de Blasio Family Image Is Leaving City Hall
